Name: Save The Cookie
About the game: Saving the cookie is a super extreme casual game where you will need to use all your superhero senses! - Transform the mouse into a cookie and move it to save it from malevolent and hungry Chester. - Check your best time and beat your personal record. - Increase your position in the world ranking and compete with your friends. - Enjoy!
